home.intro: A passionate frontend developer focused on creating elegant user interfaces and smooth user experiences. Active on GitHub as OSpoon, sharing technical experience and open source projects.
home.experience: 5 years of frontend development experience, skilled in Vue ecosystem and micro-frontend architecture, with unique insights into frontend engineering and performance optimization. Passionate about sharing frontend development experience to help more developers grow.

job1.title: Senior Frontend Developer
job1.description: Responsible for frontend architecture design and implementation of core products. Led the team in micro-frontend transformation, improving development efficiency by 30%. Spearheaded frontend performance optimization, increasing product loading speed by 50%.

job2.title: Mid-level Frontend Developer
job2.description: Responsible for frontend development of e-commerce platform, building high-performance SPA applications using Vue ecosystem. Participated in frontend component library design, improving team development efficiency.

project1.title: vxe-table-plugin
project1.description: Vue3 table plugin providing rich table functionality and flexible configuration options, supporting big data rendering and virtual scrolling.

project2.title: mini-vue-router
project2.description: Lightweight Vue routing implementation providing core functionality to help developers understand the working principles of Vue Router.

project3.title: fe-monitor
project3.description: Frontend monitoring SDK supporting performance monitoring, error capture, and user behavior tracking to help developers improve application quality.

post1.title: Vue3 Composition API Best Practices
post1.description: In-depth discussion of Vue3 Composition API usage techniques and best practices to help you write more maintainable code.

post2.title: Frontend Engineering: Building Modern Projects from Scratch
post2.description: Detailed introduction on how to build a modern frontend project from scratch with complete toolchain and best practices.

post3.title: Understanding Micro-Frontend Architecture
post3.description: Analysis of micro-frontend core concepts, implementation methods, and application scenarios, sharing experience and insights from micro-frontend transformation.
